content: {"name": "Community Servings \u2013 Teaching Kitchen", "alternate_name": "", "description": "*  For more information or to apply, please contact Client Services at 617.522.7777\n*  It is an application based service for individuals who are living with critical illnesses. \n*  The application can be found on our website and requires documentation of medical need from a medical care provider or social worker.", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "179 Amory Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Jamaica Plain", "state_province": "MA", "postal_code": "02130", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.31764039999999, "longitude": -71.1027701}, "phones": [{"number": "(617) 522-7777", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Sunday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}]}
